title: My computer is randomly freeezing mid game.
body: I just bought this computer a week ago today, its a Lenovo ideapad 100, has plenty of space and everything. I got it because my laptop stopped running league. I got this and It was running league so smooth until the last patch like two days ago. now I get into a game and like 4 seconds in to the game, it freezes. so I have to shut off my computer and reconnect. my drivers are up to date and so is my computer. I uninstalled and I thought it had worked because I got 30 minutes into a game and then it all froze. I'm not sure why this is happening, this doesn't happen with anything else on my computer, can someone help me?

replies.body:
I'm having the same problem here. My pc freezes in game and I can only reboot the pc. 
-I have my drives all up to date
-I've done a full diagnose on my PC's Hardware 3 times, all checked fine
-I've reinstalled LoL 2 times already
-I even replaced my PC to fabric settings and reinstalled everything again, and at the beginning it looked fine, but in second game, it froze again...

I think there isnt much i can do to solve this problem, at least I'm glad I'm not the only one with this issue

If you have Windows 10, there was a recent update that is auto-enabling the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) and causing issues like this for some players.  Disabling that may solve this!  If you still have issues, I recommend using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide in case there are still any updated drivers or game file issues causing this.  Hope that helps!
